timeline.bodyText: This change is weird? Doesn't look consistent with the surrounding items?
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -144,9 +144,12 @@ labelPRBasedOnFilePath:
         - extensions/jaeger/**/*
     area/jaxb:
         - extensions/jaxb/**/*
+    area/jbang:
+        - **/*JBang*
+        - **/*jbang*
     area/kafka:
-        - extensions/kafka-client/**/*
-        - integration-tests/kafka/**/*
+    - extensions/kafka-client/**/*
+    - integration-tests/kafka/**/*

replies.bodyText: hmm - gah - stuipd vscode changes indents on paste.fixing.
replies.author: maxandersen

timeline.bodyText: Aren't you already in the quarkusio/devtools group?
timeline.author: gastaldi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -20,6 +20,9 @@
 - labels: [area/maven]
   title: "(?i).*maven.*"
   notify: [quarkusio/devtools]
+- labels: [area/jbang]
+  title: "(?i).*jbang.*"
+  notify: [quarkusio/devtools,maxandersen]

replies.bodyText: but wanted to add in to see if it changes the notification setup i have. i'll remove it if the false positive gets too much.
replies.author: maxandersen
